page.title: 20A day in the life - a parent
page.content: A typical day for my Mother is waking up at{7.00 a.m.}and having breakfast. At{8.00 a.m.}she sets of for work. She works at the colleges in{Worcester}and {Evesham}.She is a part-time lecturer at both of them. She lectures in law. It is{20 miles}to Worcester and{2} {miles}to Evesham. She trained to do this about 4 years ago. It meant a lot of study at home. Her hobbies are collecting antiques, stamps and gardening. She swims, walks and visits gardens and houses in her spare time. She does the decorating, cooks the meals and does most of the other work. She also has a cleaning lady to clean the house. Her favourite programme on television is Barchester Chronicles.
